item.title: RT by @ed_solomon: The Jan 6 hearings were once again amazing, stunning and magnificent. In a related story, because it is my responsibility and my job, I have recorded the valiant attempts made by the closed-captioning software to spell Pat Cippolone.
item.dc:creator: @Merrillmarkoe

item.title:
RT by @ed_solomon: “only in America is the supposed right to carry a hidden deadly weapon in public an “ordinary self-defense need” that supersedes the rights of everyone else to be safe from gun violence.

In no other wealthy democracy is any of this “ordinary”.
item.dc:creator: @faris
item.description:
